name: Never found
description:
In the swiss mountains, secrets lie to be discovered. If you dare to go there, Synder pact soldiers will be guarding key points of entry. This is the story of a lost soul who attempted to cross the swiss mountains wanting to bypass the USON checkpoints. They fell down a cliff and barely survived, and perished in the cold, never to be found again.

All Rights Reserved
